markdownRemark.html:
The beginning of the year is always a good time to reflect on the past year and set goals for the new one. This is my list for 2015.

Goals

  • Introductory dance lesson
  • Volunteer 1 hour every month
  • 1 Lunch a month with someone I don’t know that well (Jan / Feb / Mar / Nov / Dec)
  • Complete a half marathon ✔ (Finished in 2:03:18 on March 29, 2015)
  • Give 2 presentations about something I’m passionate about ✔ Accessibility & GulpJS presentation
  • Introductory yoga class ✔ Feb 8, Yoga for the People, Berkeley
  • 1 Date a month until I meet someone ✔
  • Complete the Half Dome hike ✔ Completed on Oct 10, 2015
  • Introductory flight lesson ✔ Completed on Dec 19, 2015
  • Read 30 books (2.5 per month) ✔ (33 of 30 - Progress)

Interests

  • Real / Realtime interfaces (through websockets)
  • New front-end libraries (ReactJS / Flux)
  • Web Components (Shadow DOM / Native templates / HTML imports)

frontmatter.title: Faster Ways To Do PeopleSoft Fluid UI Development
